Articles.Content:
Okay here we will be racing to the end of the run way.

RULES:

1. You must stay on the runway

2. You must measure how long did it take to reach the end of the runway

3. You must stay on the ground (that means no flying)

A picture at the end is proof

Mine best is 57.3 seconds.

LET THE GAMES BEGIN!

Edited August 1, 2013 by stefanbogdjr

I could just say it took me 5 seconds to reach the end of the runway. I'M THE WINNER NOW.

You should ask for a screenshot at the end of the runway for fairness.
